title: Formula for Rotational Kinetic Energy
text: Use the formula for rotational kinetic $$energy:KE=\frac{1}{2} I {\omega}^2$$. We need to first calculate for the moment of inertia and then plug in the value to get KE.

title: Calculate the Moment of Inertia
text: The moment of Inertia of the merry-go-round and a child is given by $$I=I_m+I_{child}=\frac{1}{2} M_m r^2+M_{child} r^2$$. Plug in their masses and the radius to get the moment of Inertia.

title: Calculate the Rotational Kinetic Energy
text: Plug in the values and calculate the KE. Remember to convert the angular velocity $$20.0$$ rpm to radians per second first.
